title: Chicago Hit by Covid Fatigue, Rad E-Bike Disrupts Pandemic Commute, AMD Buys Chipmaker Xilinx
itunes:title: Chicago Hit by Covid Fatigue, Rad E-Bike Disrupts Pandemic Commute, AMD Buys Chipmaker Xilinx
description:
Dr. William Yates, Founder of Yates Enterprises, discusses how "Covid fatigue" has led to a rise in virus cases in the Chicago area. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Global Business Reporter Ira Boudway share the story of Seattle-based startup Rad Power Bikes growing in popularity with commuters as a result of the pandemic. Bloomberg News U.S. Semiconductor Reporter Ian King breaks down the news that AMD is buying chipmaker Xilinx for $35 billion in stock. Bloomberg News Editor Dimitra Kessenides and Adella Colvin, Owner of LolaBean Yarn Co, talk about the unlikely cultural battleground in the yarn industry. And we Drive to the Close with Brian Yacktman, CIO at YCG Investments.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Kailey Leinz. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
